Name

Crit Effect

Type

Breathless

The target is fatigued.

Bludgeoning

Spun Around

The target is flat-footed until the end of its next turn.

Piercing

Sliced Hand

Normal damage. Until healed, the target is enfeebled 1, clumsy 1, and can't used one of its hands (determined randomly by the GM).

Slashing

Combustion

If this is a fire bomb or spell, the target takes triple damage and 1d6 persistent fire damage. Any other bomb or spell deals double damage.

Bomb or Spell
name: Critical Hit Deck #40
